source_sentence: 佛說報恩奉盆經(亦云報像功德經)闕譯附東晉錄聞如是：一時，佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: The Buddha taught the Sutra of Repaying恩奉盆經(亦云報像功德經) missing from the Translation, appended to the Eastern Jin Record and heard as follows: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 大目揵連始得六通，欲度父母報乳哺之恩，即以道眼觀視世界，見其亡母生餓鬼中，
translation: When Mahāmaudgalyāyana had just attained the six supernatural powers, wishing to save his parents and repay their kindness by feeding them with milk, he looked over the world with the eye of enlightenment and saw that his deceased mother was born among the hungry ghosts.
They don't see food and drink, and their skin and bones are piled up against each other.

source_sentence: 目連悲哀，即鉢盛飯，往餉其母。
translation: With compassion, Maudgalyāyana filled his bowl with rice and went to feed his mother.

source_sentence: 母得鉢飯，便以左手障飯、右手摶食，食未入口化成火炭，遂不得食。
translation: When his mother obtained the bowlful of rice, she put food in her left hand to obstruct it and a mouthful in her right hand to eat it; but when she hadn't eaten it yet, she transformed it into a charcoal, so she couldn't eat it.

source_sentence: 目連馳還白佛，具陳如此。
translation: Maudgalyāyana rushed back to the Buddha and told him this story.

source_sentence: 佛告目連：「汝母罪根深結，非汝一人力所奈何；
translation: The Buddha said to Maudgalyāyana: Your mother is deeply fettered by the roots of sin.

source_sentence: 當須眾僧威神之力，乃得解脫。
translation: You must rely on the authoritative power of the saṃgha to attain liberation.

source_sentence: 吾今當說救濟之法，令一切難皆離憂苦。」
translation: Now, I will explain the method of salvation so that all difficulties will be freed from sorrow and suffering.

source_sentence: 佛告目連：「七月十五日，當為七世父母在厄難中者，具麨飯、五果、汲灌瓫器、香油、庭燭、床榻、臥具，
translation: The Buddha told Maudgalyāyana, On the fifteenth day of the seventh month, if his parents in seven worlds were to be in distress and difficulty, he would provide cooked rice, five fruits, a pot for pouring water, fragrant oil, a candle in the courtyard, a bed and seat, and bedding.
All the world's sweet delicacies are offered to the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 當此之日，一切聖眾，或在山間禪定、或得四道果、或樹下經行、或得六通飛行，
translation: On that day, all the holy monks and nuns stayed in the mountains to meditate, some attained the fruit of the four kinds of enlightenment, some walked up and down under trees, some flew on the wing of the six supernatural powers.

source_sentence: 菩薩大人權示比丘在大眾中，皆共同心受鉢和羅。
translation: The bodhisattvas and great men were authorized to show the monks who were in the assembly that they all shared the same mind and accepted the bowl of vaiḍāra.

source_sentence: 具清淨戒聖眾之道，其德汪洋，其有供養此等之眾，七世父母、五種親屬得出三塗，
translation: They are endowed with the paths of pure morality and holy beings, their virtues vast and oceanic. Those who make offerings to them will be liberated from the three evil destinies by seven generations of parents and five kinds of kinsmen.
They'll be liberated at the right time, and their clothing and food will naturally arise.

source_sentence: 佛勅眾僧：「當為施主家七世父母，行禪定意，然後食此供。」
translation: The Buddha commanded the saṃgha, You must practice meditation for the sake of the donor's seven-generation parents and then eat this offering.

source_sentence: 目連、比丘及一切眾，歡喜奉行。
translation: Maudgalyāyana, the monks, and all the other members of the assembly joyfully carried it out.
Foshuo yuan奉盆經, a scripture of repaying kindness
